class.name: BlipKitInstrument
class.brief_description: Changes the output parameters of a [BlipKitTrack] while a note is playing or after it was released.

method.name: set_adsr
method.description: Initializes the [constant SEQUENCE_VOLUME] envelope with an ADSR envelope. This corresponds to the following call: [codeblocks] [gdscript] instrument.set_envelope(BlipKitInstrument.SEQUENCE_VOLUME, [attack, decay, 240, release], [1.0, sustain, sustain, 0.0], 2, 1) [/gdscript] [/codeblocks]

method.name: set_envelope
method.description: Creates an envelope with [param type]. The values [param sustain_offset] and [param sustain_length] define the range of the sustain cycle which is repeated while the note is playing. If [param steps] is empty, [param values] is used as a sequence. In this case, the duration of each value is defined with [BlipKitTrack.instrument_divider].

constants.constant: Volume envelope. Changes the output value of [member BlipKitTrack.volume] by multiplying it with values from the envelope.
Panning envelope. Changes the output value of [member BlipKitTrack.panning] by adding values from the envelope.
Pitch envelope. Changes the output value of [member BlipKitTrack.note] by adding values from the envelope.

Duty cycle envelope. Changes the output value of [member BlipKitTrack.duty_cycle] by overriding it with values from the envelope. If an envelope value is [code]0[/code], [member BlipKitTrack.duty_cycle] is not changed. [b]Node:[/b] Values are cast to integers and clamped between [code]0[/code] and [code]15[/code].
